name: Sound Swiper
description:
This is my 9th game in my game a week series!

This game was chosen as the arcade game for this week. It takes inspiration from the classic game, Fruit Ninja. You must swipe to cut the colorful balls, they give you 1 point and also play a fun sound.

This game is somewhat music inspired too, there are 5 different beats to play in the background, and 5 sets of unique sounds (each ball having it's own sound).

You can also customize your swipe color!

Did you know I make games every single week? You can checkout progression videos for each game, and even how I make them on my youtube channel here: One Week Games - YouTube you can also follow my instagram to stay up to date with all of my games and even vote for the next game I make! You can find my instagram here: Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos
